attributes.action: reduce standing charges for the supply of domestic energy (gas and electricity)
attributes.additional_details: we should all have access to heating & hot water without having to worry, i appreciate gas prices soared because of Russia, but this did not cause standing charge to rise, this was partly due to companies that went bust , which was not UK populations fault
attributes.background: standing charge for electric & gas needs reducing to a sensible amount for everyone to afford, this could also mean the benefits paid to some users be reduced,saving more money

rejection.details:
Decisions about caps on energy prices, including standing charges, are a matter for Ofgem, not the UK Government or Parliament, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Pass legislation to remove standing charges for the supply of energy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635530
